BENCHMARKS.2: FTSE UK Conventional Gilts All Stocks TR Index
BENCHMARKS.3: JPM GBI Global Traded TR Index
BENCHMARKS.4: S&P United Kingdom Property TR Index
BENCHMARKS.6: FTSE Small Cap Total Return Index

BENCHNOTES.2: UK 10 Years Govt Bond Total Return Index from 1970, FTSE UK Conventional Gilts All Stocks TR Index from 1976, return reduced by 0.5%
BENCHNOTES.3: Proxy based on 10-year US Govt Bonds from 1970, Lehman Composite from 1973, JPM GBI Global Traded TR Index from 1986
BENCHNOTES.6: Data from 1986, we are using UK Equities to serve as a proxy UK Small Cap Equities.
